verses.verse: <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H215>shine;<s%> for your <S%H216>light<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is risen on <S%H2224>you.<s%>

<S%H2822>For,<s%> behold, darkness shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and gross <S%H6205>darkness<s%> the <S%H3816>peoples;<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H2224>arise<s%> on <S%H3519>you,<s%> and his glory shall be seen on <S%H7200>you.<s%>
<S%H1471>Nations<s%> shall <S%H1980>come<s%> to your <S%H216>light,<s%> and <S%H4428>kings<s%> to the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> of your <S%H2225>rising.<s%>

"Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> and <S%H7200>see:<s%> they all gather themselves <S%H6908>together,<s%> they <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1121>you;<s%> your sons shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H7350>far,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H539>carried<s%> in the <S%H6654>arms.<s%>

Then you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> and be <S%H5102>radiant,<s%> and your <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H6342>thrill<s%> and be <S%H7337>enlarged;<s%> because the <S%H1995>abundance<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall be <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H2428>you,<s%> the wealth of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall come to <S%H935>you.<s%>

The <S%H8229>multitude<s%> of <S%H1581>camels<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H1070>you,<s%> the dromedaries of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> and <S%H5891>Ephah;<s%> all they from <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> shall <S%H935>come;<s%> they shall <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3828>frankincense,<s%> and shall <S%H1319>proclaim<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

All the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> shall be gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> to <S%H352>you,<s%> the rams of <S%H5032>Nebaioth<s%> shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> to <S%H5927>you;<s%> they shall come up with <S%H7522>acceptance<s%> on my <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and I will <S%H6286>glorify<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H8597>glory.<s%>
"Who are these who <S%H5774>fly<s%> as a <S%H5645>cloud,<s%> and as the <S%H3123>doves<s%> to their <S%H699>windows?<s%>

Surely the <S%H339>islands<s%> shall <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H591>me,<s%> and the ships of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> <S%H7223>first,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H7350>far,<s%> their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> with <S%H8034>them,<s%> for the name of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and for the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> because he has glorified <S%H6286>you.<s%>

<S%H5236>"Foreigners<s%> shall build <S%H1129>up<s%> your <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and their <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> to <S%H7110>you:<s%> for in my wrath I <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H7522>you,<s%> but in my favor have I had mercy on <S%H7355>you.<s%>

Your <S%H8179>gates<s%> also shall be <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H8548>continually;<s%> they shall not be <S%H5462>shut<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> nor <S%H3915>night;<s%> that men may <S%H935>bring<s%> to you the <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and their <S%H4428>kings<s%> led <S%H5090>captive.<s%>
For that <S%H1471>nation<s%> and <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> that will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> you shall <S%H6>perish;<s%> <S%H1471>yes,<s%> those nations shall be <S%H2717>utterly<s%> <S%H2717>wasted.<s%>

"The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1265>you,<s%> the fir tree, the <S%H8410>pine,<s%> and the box <S%H8410>tree<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> to <S%H6286>beautify<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> and I will make the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H3513>glorious.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of those who <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> you shall <S%H1980>come<s%> <S%H7817>bending<s%> to <S%H5006>you;<s%> and all those who despised you shall bow themselves <S%H7812>down<s%> at the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> you The <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> The <S%H6726>Zion<s%> of the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H8478>"Whereas<s%> you have been <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> and <S%H8130>hated,<s%> so that no man passed <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H7760>you,<s%> I will make you an <S%H5769>eternal<s%> <S%H1347>excellency,<s%> a <S%H4885>joy<s%> of <S%H1755>many<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

You shall also <S%H3243>drink<s%> the <S%H2461>milk<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and shall <S%H3243>nurse<s%> from <S%H4428>royal<s%> <S%H7699>breasts;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, am your <S%H3467>Savior,<s%> and your <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> the Mighty <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

For <S%H5178>brass<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and for <S%H1270>iron<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and for <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and for <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H1270>iron.<s%> I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H6486>officers<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> your <S%H5065>ruler.<s%>

<S%H2555>Violence<s%> shall no more be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H7701>desolation<s%> nor <S%H7667>destruction<s%> within your <S%H1366>borders;<s%> but you shall <S%H7121>call<s%> your <S%H2346>walls<s%> <S%H3444>Salvation,<s%> and your <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H8416>Praise.<s%>

The <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall be no more your <S%H216>light<s%> by <S%H3119>day;<s%> neither for <S%H5051>brightness<s%> shall the <S%H3394>moon<s%> give <S%H216>light<s%> to <S%H3068>you:<s%> but Yahweh will be to you an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H215>light,<s%> and your <S%H430>God<s%> your <S%H8597>glory.<s%>

Your <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall no more go <S%H935>down,<s%> neither shall your <S%H3391>moon<s%> <S%H622>withdraw<s%> <S%H3068>itself;<s%> for Yahweh will be your <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> and the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H60>mourning<s%> shall be <S%H7999>ended.<s%>

Your <S%H5971>people<s%> also shall be all <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> they shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> the <S%H5342>branch<s%> of my <S%H4302>planting,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands,<s%> that I may be <S%H6286>glorified.<s%>

The little <S%H6996>one<s%> shall become a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and the small <S%H6810>one<s%> a <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nation;<s%> <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, will <S%H2363>hasten<s%> it in its <S%H6256>time.<s%>"
